# Inputs

## Column

```{r}
# shiny inputs defined here
basicPage(
  h3("If there is a reactive value the code will run on app load and then on each change"),
  h4("See the console"),
  textInput("mytext", "Type and see the console"),
  h5("the sequence will print anytime that there is a change in mytext")
)
```
 
    
```{r}
  observe({
    input$mytext
    # will only run when the app loads, never again
    print(1:10)     #: prints ONLY to the console not the web page
  })
```
